page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content:
My name is Sarah Clough. I am writing about the hobbies I have. I go to something nearly every day and they are my hobbies. On Monday I go to{Speech and Drama. I}go at 6.OO p.m. and leave at 6.45 p.m. It is where I learn to speak properly and how to hold a book when I'm reading it. On Wednesday I go to{Ballet}That is where I learn to dance. On Thursday I go to {Drama.}I go at 7.OO p.m. until 9.OO p.m. On Saturday I go{Trampolining} and on Sunday I go to{Church} I have a special hobby at home which is{ {breeding rabbits} guinea pigs and hamsters. I have eleven rabbits, two hamsters and two guinea-pigs. These are the hobbies that I do now.
Sarah Clough.
